1.0.name: wordpress/disable-self-pingbacks-paulund
1.0.description:
This is a Wordpress plugin that will stop Wordpress from performing self pingbacks.

When a blog links to other blogs it will perform a pingback to let the blog owners know the content is linked to. By default Wordpress will do the samething even with internal links, so you will be notified there is a link.

This Wordpress plugin will stop this default behavour.

Learn what this plugin does at: http://www.paulund.co.uk/how-to-disable-self-trackbacks
